rdfs:label: Stakeholder Engagement Ontology
rdfs:comment: An ontology for representing stakeholders and their relationships in project contexts

classes.rdfs:label: Stakeholder Entity
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents any person, group, or organization that has interest in or influence over a project or initiative

classes.rdfs:label: Individual Stakeholder
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents a single person who is a stakeholder

classes.rdfs:label: Group Stakeholder
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents a collection of individuals who form a stakeholder group

classes.rdfs:label: Organizational Stakeholder
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents an organization that is a stakeholder

classes.rdfs:label: Issue
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents a specific concern, topic, or problem relevant to stakeholders

classes.rdfs:label: Influence Level
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents the degree of influence a stakeholder has

classes.rdfs:label: Interest Level
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents the degree of interest a stakeholder has

classes.rdfs:label: Engagement Record
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents a specific instance of stakeholder engagement

classes.rdfs:label: Communication Preference
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents the preference method of communication of the stakeholder

classes.rdfs:label: Concern
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents a specific issue or topic that is important to a stakeholder

classes.rdfs:label: Resource Contribution
classes.rdfs:comment: Represents resources a stakeholder can contribute to a project
